analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni das sana ttikaḥ upa ād āduka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham upādā dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham no upādā dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham no upādā dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā ca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham no upādā ca anidassana appaṭigham no upādā ca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
